DOC.brief_summary: The clinical study collect data verify safety performance Cook Celect Filter prevention pulmonary embolism ( PE ) patient temporary permanent high risk thromboembolism .
DOC.brief_title: Celect Vena Cava Filter Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: The patient high risk pulmonary embolism consideration placement permanent shortterm IVC filter . The patient must patent internal jugular vein . The patient guardian must give informed consent . The patient must agree return clinical image followup 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month . The patient must agree clinical image examination perform prior filter retrieval . The patient must agree return clinical image followup 30 day 3 month filter retrieval . The patient le 18 year age . The patient pregnant . The patient uncontrollable coagulopathy . The patient life expectancy le 6 month . The patient vena cava diameter 30 mm , measure vena cava size catheter . The patient 's vena cava diameter le 15 mm , measure vena cava size catheter . The patient contrast allergy adequately premedicated . The patient simultaneously participate another investigative drug device study , previous IVC filter .
